// Permission utility functions for role-based access control
export const isReadOnlyRole=role=>{return role==='boss'||role==='staff';};export const canEdit=role=>{return role==='admin'||role==='agent';};export const canView=role=>{return['admin','agent','staff','boss'].includes(role);};export const canManageStaff=role=>{return role==='admin'||role==='boss';};export const canManageAgents=role=>{return role==='admin'||role==='boss';};export const canManageCustomers=role=>{return role==='admin'||role==='agent';};export const canAccessDashboard=role=>{return role==='admin'||role==='agent'||role==='boss';};export const canAccessProjects=role=>{return role==='admin'||role==='agent'||role==='boss';};export const canAccessData=role=>{return role==='admin'||role==='boss';};export const getPermissionMessage=role=>{switch(role){case'boss':return'You have read-only access to all system data.';case'staff':return'You have limited access to customer and agent information.';case'agent':return'You can manage your customers and view relevant data.';case'admin':return'You have full administrative access to all system features.';default:return'Access level not recognized.';}};
